snippet: The Quidditch World Cup, played in the world of Harry Potter by wizards and witches on broomsticks, will have its real world adaptation this weekend in Florida.
abstract: Macaulay Marauders of CUNY's Macaulay Honors College are among three New York teams that will compete in sixth annual Quidditch World Cup, real-world adaptation of sport played by wizards an witches in Harry Potter books and movies, being held in Kissimmee, Fla; game has spread to hundreds of college campuses, with about 80 teams competing in 2013 tournament.
lead_paragraph: The Quidditch World Cup, played in the world of Harry Potter by wizards and witches on broomsticks, will have its real world adaptation this weekend in Florida.

headline.seo: Playing a Wizard’s Game On Ordinary Broomsticks
